<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_composite_data_template"><sys_ux_composite_data_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><name>Sprint view</name><sys_class_name>sys_ux_composite_data_template</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-11 14:45:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>16cf3abc8375f21089529370ceaad396</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sprint view</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Retrospective Management" source="x_1865669_retrospe">fe15f7248365fa5089529370ceaad3a1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Retrospective Management">fe15f7248365fa5089529370ceaad3a1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_composite_data_template_16cf3abc8375f21089529370ceaad396</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-11 14:45:51</sys_updated_on><template>{
  "component": "now-card-evam-record",
  "staticValues": {
    "highlightedHeaderIcon": {
      "translatable": false,
      "key": "flag-fill"
    },
    "highlightedHeaderBkgColor": {
      "translatable": false,
      "key": "moderate"
    },
    "subtitleIcon": {
      "translatable": false,
      "key": "calendar-fill"
    },
    "imageType": {
      "translatable": false,
      "key": "image"
    },
    "subtitleImageType": {
      "translatable": false,
      "key": "avatar"
    },
    "detailLabelOne": {
      "translatable": true,
      "key": "Team"
    },
    "detailLabelTwo": {
      "translatable": true,
      "key": "Start - End"
    },
    "detailLabelThree": {
      "translatable": true,
      "key": "State"
    },
    "showCardShadow": {
      "translatable": false,
      "key": false
    }
  },
  "mappings": {
    "highlightedHeaderLabel": "number",                 // e.g. RETROSPR00123
    "textHeaderLabel": "sprint_name",                   // Sprint name
    "titleLabel": "sprint_name",                        // Main title
    "imageURL": "team.manager.photo",                   // Optional: team manager photo
    "subtitle": "team.team_name",                       // Subtitle under header (team)
    "subtitleAvatarName": "team.manager.name",          // Avatar initials/name
    "subtitleAvatarURL": "team.manager.photo",          // Avatar image
    "detailValueOne": "team.team_name",                 // Team name again or other info
    "detailValueTwo": "start_date,end_date",            // You can format via formatter/data resource
    "detailValueThree": "state"                         // in_progress / ready_for_review / complete
  },
  "actionMappings": {
    "mainActions": [
      "open_record",        // custom or standard action to open sprint
      "view_retrospectives" // custom action to show related retros
    ],
    "clickAction": "navigation"
  }
}</template></sys_ux_composite_data_template></record_update>
